price: 25.Nanu abne dambittek messerimtaanaay, isin uma taamak abtaanamak nanu messerimna keenik ixxic nabiyow.
arabic: قُل لَّا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّآ أَجۡرَمۡنَا وَلَا نُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul lā tus'alūna ʿammā ajramnā walā nus'alu ʿammā taʿmalūna
